summary: Feature length documentary of the real story behind the legend of The Mothman.

Mckee|Lea Wilson|Roy Cross|Susan Sheppard|Woodrow Derenberger|Beau T. Bellamy|Danny S. Cutler|Hazel K. DeWitt|Cloud Starchaser|Todd Wiseman
title: Eyes of the Mothman
